name: Dawn of Malice
description:
IF YOU LIKE THIS GAME, SUPPORT US ON PATREON!

https://www.patreon.com/whiteleafstudio

Your father moved to another country, so you decide to move back to the city where you were born. There, you will discover friendship, love and lots of sex.

Dawn of Malice has a unique feature, you can choose your moral alignment at the beginning, and this will allow you to have some UNIQUE options during your gaming.

Think carefully, because there is no going back from your actions in this game.
